title: POWERMYPI Raspberry Pi Power C
summary:
Take control of your Raspberry Pi board.
Send command to your Raspberry Pi or whatever *NIX board.
Power Off, Reboot and 4 customizable commands.

Long press on any of 4 commands to customize name.

Istructions for the Raspberry:

- Open a terminal

cd /home/pi
git clone https://github.com/thinkedinthesea/PowermyPi-UNO.git
cd PowermyPi-UNO
chmod u+x install.sh
sudo ./install.sh 3

reboot and enjoy !!!



For any other info check github page.
